text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate provided a comprehensive legal brief structure. It explicitly details the elements of the common law/statutory test for reasonable force (necessity and proportionality), analyzes the impact of the honest but mistaken belief regarding the victim being armed, and references numerous relevant case laws (e.g., Owino, Palmer, Beckford, Williams (Gladstone)) and statutory provisions (CJIA 2008 s.76) to support the advice.", "criterion_id": "63ab3c85-b0ca-4a1d-a962-dd86eb3f35b5"}
